divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving back from picking up my son from football game. Observed lights like a plane while driving to home in St. Marys road. Obsject was by the Buena Vista Road exit to the left side. I beleived at first that it was a stealth bomber. Subject had same shape, but did not heard any sound. I open my car window still did not hear noise. Object had plane lights to on end of eachh wing. two small red near center of obsject. Subject appreared to be hovering. We are near Ft benning some I know military planes, plus I was military also. This was something different.
Summary: Observed light like plane but no sound.
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Columbus
There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around October 18th 2012
